name: BobbiesFantasticAdventure
description:
THANKS FOR PLAYING CARRUMBUM!

This will be the most messed up disturbing game you will ever play.... Join Bobbie on his adventure through mlg bob land where he becomes the worlds best abortionist! Witnesses some of the worlds greatest achievements and becomes a member of the Nazis. Welcome to Bobbie's fantastic adventure!

ATTENTION

This game will only get better with the support of the community currently it is in early alpha since it has only taken me 1 day to make. However we have plans to increase the size of the game, the things you can do, and the places you can explore. What you see now is a small representation of the what this game can become but It can only become greater through donations and feedback from you guys!

HAVE FUN!!!
